question:
Which of the following established the Madras Mahajan Sabha?
1) M. Veeraraghavachariar
2) G. Subramania Iyer
3) P. Anandacharlu
Select the correct answer from the codes given below:
explanation: Madras Mahajan Sabha was established by M. Veeraraghavachariar, G. Subramania Iyer and P. Anandacharlu in 1884 CE. Â The main objective was to co-ordinate the activities of the local association and to 'provide a focus for the non-official intelligence spread up through the Presidency'.
